snippet.textDisplay: I wish they'd do a sequel for this game, if they haven't already. I'd like to see it on a new platform with better graphics. It wasn't too long ago that I finally sat down and finished the game, maybe 3-4 years ago now. It took me so long to finally beat it because I was younger, was frustrated easily, and had about half of the coordination I do now lol. I'm glad I finally decided to play it again.
snippet.textOriginal: I wish they'd do a sequel for this game, if they haven't already. I'd like to see it on a new platform with better graphics. snippet.textDisplay: I would love to see a sequel for this.

snippet.textDisplay: This soundtrack is so good it makes me want to play the game solely based on it.
snippet.textOriginal: This soundtrack is so good it makes me want to play the game solely based on it.

snippet.textDisplay: Very calming track and the game looks interesting!
snippet.textOriginal: Very calming track and the game looks interesting!

snippet.textDisplay: This is such a nice game with an unbelievably good soundtrack. This track, however? One of the weaker ones in there, in my opinion. Hopefully we'll see some more in your list. :)
snippet.textOriginal: This is such a nice game with an unbelievably good soundtrack. This track, however? One of the weaker ones in there, in my opinion. Hopefully we'll see some more in your list. :)

snippet.textDisplay:
Longtime (for the internet) viewer-fan, first time poster. First off, love the uploads, a great mix of nostalgia, discovery, and new-found appreciation. Second, on the subject of Wii-ware games, I highly recommend the Art Style series for both gameplay and music (orbient and light trax for sure in that respect). 

Some vgm love I hope to see : Power Fighters, RC Pro Am, Robotron 64, Shadows of the Damned, Meteos, Ikaruga, DK Jungle Beat, Mischief Makers, Kirby canvas curse, and Lords of Thunder.
snippet.textOriginal:
Longtime (for the internet) viewer-fan, first time poster. First off, love the uploads, a great mix of nostalgia, discovery, and new-found appreciation. Some vgm love I hope to see : Power Fighters, RC Pro Am, Robotron 64, Shadows of the Damned, Meteos, Ikaruga, DK Jungle Beat, Mischief Makers, Kirby canvas curse, and Lords of Thunder.

snippet.textDisplay: Why not get the FFIV Complete Collection on the PSP?  Then you get FFIV, FFIV: After Years, and the ability to switch between orchestral and original soundtracks on FFIV.
snippet.textOriginal: Why not get the FFIV Complete Collection on the PSP?  Then you get FFIV, FFIV: After Years, and the ability to switch between orchestral and original soundtracks on FFIV.

snippet.textDisplay: One of the bad things about FFIV:TAY is, if you get the wii version of FFIV:TAY, you have to buy ALL the chapters. Each one costs about 300 wii points, so that could tick some people off...
snippet.textOriginal: One of the bad things about FFIV:TAY is, if you get the wii version of FFIV:TAY, you have to buy ALL the chapters. Each one costs about 300 wii points, so that could tick some people off...

snippet.textDisplay: One of my very favorite Wii games, with one﻿ of my favorite soundtracks as well. It did have a slightly wonky translation, though, if I remember. Believe the original game was in Brazilian Portuguese or something?
snippet.textOriginal: One of my very favorite Wii games, with one﻿ of my favorite soundtracks as well. It did have a slightly wonky translation, though, if I remember. Believe the original game was in Brazilian Portuguese or something?

snippet.textDisplay: Haven't heard this song before, but I think its great.  FFIV After Years is great just make sure you get all the parts don't skip out on one or two.
snippet.textOriginal: Haven't heard this song before, but I think its great.  FFIV After Years is great just make sure you get all the parts don't skip out on one or two.

snippet.textDisplay: This was a nice surprise﻿ for the WiiWare back in 2009. I haven't played a lot of WiiWare games actually. There's this game, the Bit.tip series, Mega Man 9&10 and World of Goo. I think that's about it. I plan to get Final Fantasy IV After Years at some point, though I've heard good and bad things about it.
